description:
As a Regional Security Specialist, you will use open source material to find, research and assess information that could indicate a potential threat or concern to Google and its employees. You will create detailed reports of incidents using an incident management reporting systems and assist in incident response. In this role, you will help develop protocols and practices to assess and mitigate threats to Google, drive efficiency and manage crises.

From keeping Googlers safe and secure to managing disruptive events, the ability to anticipate, deter, detect, and act are the pillars of Google’s Global Security and Resilience Services (GSRS) team. As a member of GSRS you will help develop a culture where safety, security and resiliency are integrated into every facet of Google, including the creative process. You will help us continually identify, evaluate and monitor enterprise risks that could affect business activities and provide business leaders the information they need to make critical decisions. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to create innovative strategies and develop programs that drive sustainable effectiveness.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Experience working as part of a global security team.
  • Ability to work non-standard hours, including weekends, holidays and on shift-based schedules as required.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 1 year of experience working in a Security Operations Center, Emergency Service Control Room or similar command center/call center.
  • Experience providing support for domestic and international security operations.
  • Knowledge of security technologies including CCTV, Access Control and Incident Management Systems.
  • Ability to speak and write in more than one language fluently and idiomatically.
responsibilities:
• Monitor and investigate CCTV/alarms.
  • Create detailed reports of incidents using incident management reporting systems.
  • Assist in the response to larger incidents that impact Google and its staff.
  • Ensure customer satisfaction and operational efficiency through field calls and other requests.
  • Support/complete project management work within the Security Operations Center environment.
title: Regional Security Specialist, Global Security Operations Center
